About me

I am graduated from Middle Tennessee State University(MTSU) in Computer Science. While attending in MTSU, I wrote most of project in C++. So I have more experience with C++. After I graduated, I work at Alorica as Computer Engineering which develop and setup a testing enivorment for HP refurbish units. Recently I start learning windowfrom in C#, which using as tool from testing units.
